text: "Saving All My Love for You" is a 1985 song written by Michael Masser and Gerry Goffin with arrangement by Gene Page. It was originally a minor hit for Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis Jr. in 1978 on their album Marilyn & Billy. A cover of the song was done by American recording artist Whitney Houston, for her album Whitney Houston, which was released on February 14, 1985 by Arista Records. The song was the second single from the album in the United States and third worldwide. title: Saving All My Love for You
